metadata.title: CVE-2024-51482 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source closed-circuit television softwareapplication. ZoneMinder v1.37.* <= 1.37.64 is vulnerable to boolean-basedSQL Injection in function of web/ajax/event.php. This is fixed in 1.37.65.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
